title: Questions?
content:
Questions?

Q. What will I be writing about?

A. I will be writing about topics that I come across in my daily life as a student of Machine Learning. I’ll be working on:

  • Transformers for Vision and NLP
  • JAX, FLAX and Haiku
  • Search and Personalization
  • Semi Supervised Learning

Will perhaps write on some of the other things that I am learning:

  • Markdown
  • Hugo
  • Python Developement tools

Q. How can you follow me?

A. I am most active on Twitter @varuntul22.
